result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Curtis William Ross

records.addlTxt: Granting Atty's Motion to withdraw as counsel
Granting Attorney's Motion to Withdraw as Counsel
Def NA - in federal custody;  STC: 11-2-2022 @ 10am

State by Skemp by video /  Def by Atty Mochalski by video
CRT:  State advised that def is in the Dane CJ.  Motion to Modify bond was filed 5-4-2022
State is in compliance w/ Victims Rights
Mochalski:  def has been sitting on $100,000 cash bond since Feb.  He is indigent.  The bond goes beyond what is necessary to require def's appearance & safety of the public
State:  Mr Ross has been convicted in Fed. CRT for fel Possession of a firearm.  He is pending sentencing in Sept.  Def is being detained w/o bond.  We argued for cash bond because of his non-appearances.  There was a warrant outstanding at time of his arrest.  firearm towards an officer to avoid apprehension.  $100,000 bond is approp - req bond remain the same
CRT goes over charges in 21CF686 - dismissed due to Federal Indictment.  In Feb. 2022 he has another charge of possession of a firearm as a convicted felon.  CRT has reviewed def's other cases in other county.  CRT will keep the cash bond as is.  CRT will consider a bond Hrg after def is sentenced in federal CRT
CRT:  Reschedule STC on 6-23-2022 & schedule it to 9-1-2022 @ 10am

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Bail/bond hearing on June 20, 2022 at 03:30 pm.
Bail/bond hearing on May 5, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

State by Skemp / Def pro se in custody in LCJ  w/ Atty Mochalski
Hrg by Zoom
Mochalski:  def is on $100,000 bond - req to be reduced.  Def is indigent, cannot post bond...he is  on an indictment in Westerm District of WI - he would have to make bond for that...
State opposes any reduction...def failed to appear 3 times in last year...fled from officers...I have been in contact w/ Western District & they inidcated they could proceed despite the cash bond here...
CRT:  I issued the original warrant in 21CF944, there are serious charges...not sure if State was aware of Milwaukee case19CF305, CRT goes over cases in Milwaukee.  Bond is mute issue - he has failed to appear, he has run from police & now there is allegation of firing at police
CRT:  MOTION TO REDUCE BOND IS DENIED

records.descr: Application for specific judicial assign approved

records.addlTxt:
State by Skemp /  Def w/ Atty Jeff Mochalski
Hrg by Zoom Video
21CF944 - State asks CRT to take Judicial Notice of bond in 21CF686
CRT:  The Record will show that
WITNESS: Ofcr G.E. 
State asks CRT to take Judicial Notice of bond in 22CF646
CRT:  I believe the CRT Notice of that is in other file (22CF149) & I'll do that in this case
State asks CRT to take Judicial Notice of the Fel. conviction in Milwaukee Co case 10CF2241
Mochalski:  no objection - we know about that
CRT will take Notice
22CF249 - WITNESS:  Ofcr H.H. 
Sanford:  Officer H. is only witness we have today - not sure we have met our burden.  We can continue this for testimony on the drugs....
Mochalski:  we object to any continuance of the Hrg - to the extend of evidence on this case, it's only a firearm & BJ, we'd ask taht Cts 3 & 4 be dismissed
CRT:  I think from CRT's perspective, I will find PC to Endanger Safety & Possess of Firearm & Cocaine.  Mr Sanford, I'll leave it up to you whether you want to refile the Poss w/ Intent - Heroin
CRT:  Probable cause found in both cases - boundover for trial
Information filed in 21CF944, Sanford will file new Information in 22CF149
Def stands mute - NG plea entered
Mochalski req Substitution of Judge
CRT:  I'll Grant that - it shouild be filed by end of day today
Status: to be set w/ new judge
